name: Squirrels Mobile
description:
Handmade needle felted ooak squirrel soft sculptures / finger puppets. They are about 3 inches tall. They are placed on little wooden poles and can be taken out and worn on your fingers as puppets.

The mobile they are placed in measures about 9x10 inches. It is made of piece wood from a reclaimed vintage sewing box, wire, and a fluffy white pompom hanging from the top.

name: Sloth Couple Mobile
description:
One-of-a-kind nursery/home decor mobile and an eco-friendly toy.

Handmade needle-felted sloth soft sculptures / finger puppets, made of wool, hanging on a mobile. The sloths are about 3 inches (8 cm) tall. Placed on wooden pegs, they can be taken out and used as finger puppets.

The mobile measures about 10x10.5 inches (25x27 cm). It is made of a wood, wire, and a fluffy white pompom hanging from the top. It is suitable for hanging from the ceiling or on a wall, to decorate a nursery, a kids room, or any other room.

This item is made to order, please expect 3-5 business days before shipping.

name: Unicorn Couple Mobile
description:
One-of-a-kind nursery/home decor mobile and an eco-friendly toy.

Handmade needle-felted unicorn soft sculptures / finger puppets, made of wool, hanging on a mobile. The unicorns are about 3 inches (8 cm) tall. Placed on wooden pegs, they can be taken out and used as finger puppets.

The mobile measures about 9x10.5 inches (23x27 cm). It is made of a wood, wire, and a fluffy white pompom hanging from the top. It is suitable for hanging from the ceiling or on a wall, to decorate a nursery, a kids room, or any other room.

This item is made to order, please expect 3-5 business days before shipping.

name: Anteaters Box
description:
One-of-a-kind nursery / home decor shadow box, and an eco-friendly toy.

Felted anteater soft sculptures / finger puppets, in an upcycled vintage wooden sewing box. Placed on little wooden poles, they can be taken out and used as finger puppets.

I needle-felted this happy couple from 100% wool, and knitted their sweaters with yarn. They measure about 3 inches (8 cm) tall. I upcycled a vintage wooden sewing box to make a rustic, cozy home for them. 

The box measures 6.5x6.6x2 inches (17x16.5x5 cm), and comes with a tiny thimble flowerpot and a tiny felt bunting banner. It is suitable for hanging on a wall, to decorate a nursery, a kids room, or any other room.

This item is made to order, please expect 3-5 business days before shipping.
